basics.name: Yasunori Sakai
basics.label: Mechatronics Researcher
basics.Degree: PhD in Mechanical and Control Engineering,  Master in Bio-Application and Systems Engineering,  Registered Professional Engineer in Japan
basics.summary: Mechatronics researcher, pushes the boundaries of intelligent manufacturing by integrating smart materials, sensors, and AI.

skills.name: Embedded Systems & Wireless Power Transfer
keywords: Wireless Power Transfer (Acoustic Energy, RF, Inductive)

projects.name: Direct Fabrication of Flexible Piezoelectric Components with Clad-Core Structures for Active Control of Material Properties
projects.summary: This project aims to develop a direct fabrication technology for flexible piezoelectric components with clad-core structures, enabling active control of material properties.
projects.funding: Japan Society for the Promotion of Science (JSPS) KAKENHI Grant (Grant-in-Aid for Scientific Research (C))

projects.name: Ultrasonic Heating-Based Incremental Sheet Forming for Simultaneous Control of Complex Shapes and Surface Functions
projects.summary: This project explores the development of an ultrasonic heating-based incremental sheet forming method that enables simultaneous control of complex shapes and surface functions.
projects.funding: Japan Society for the Promotion of Science (JSPS) KAKENHI Grant (Grant-in-Aid for Scientific Research (C))

projects.name: Development of Functionally Graded 3D Printing Technology for Shape Memory Composites with Clad-Core Structures
projects.summary: This project focuses on the development of a 3D printing technology that enables functionally graded fabrication of shape memory composites with clad-core structures.
projects.funding: Japan Society for the Promotion of Science (JSPS) KAKENHI Grant (Grant-in-Aid for Early-Career Scientists)

projects.name: Development of Ultrasonically Assisted Transfer Processing Technology for High-Strength Texturing of Large-Area Sliding Surfaces
projects.summary: This research aims to develop an ultrasonic-assisted transfer processing technology that enables high-strength texturing for large-area sliding surfaces.
projects.funding: Japan Society for the Promotion of Science (JSPS) KAKENHI Grant (Grant-in-Aid for Scientific Research (C))

projects.name: Research on Space Exploration and Education for Space Development Human Resource Training
projects.summary: This project focused on space exploration research and the development of educational programs for training future professionals in space development.
projects.funding: Shibaura Institute of Technology Branding Research Project

projects.name: Development of ‘SPLASH’ - Semi-Solid Fine Joining Technology for Dissimilar Materials Using Laser-Based Localized Temperature Control
projects.summary: This research aimed to develop a novel semi-solid fine joining technique (SPLASH) for dissimilar materials using laser-based localized temperature control.

projects.name: Development of an Advanced Dynamic Analysis System for Feed Drive Mechanisms in Machine Tools Considering Contact Stiffness of Rolling Elements
projects.summary: This project developed an advanced dynamic analysis system for machine tool feed drive mechanisms by incorporating the contact stiffness of rolling elements.
projects.funding: Japan Society for the Promotion of Science (JSPS) KAKENHI Grant (Grant-in-Aid for Early-Career Scientists (B))

projects.name: Research on High-Value-Added Processing of Food Using Laser Technology
projects.summary: This research explored the application of laser technology for high-value-added food processing, enhancing quality and precision.
projects.funding: Industry-Academia Joint Research with Orihara Rice Cracker Co., Ltd.

projects.name: Development of a Drive Condition Monitoring System for Precision Positioning Stages Using Vibration Sensing
projects.summary: This project aimed to develop a system for monitoring the drive condition of precision positioning stages using vibration sensing techniques.
projects.funding: Shotoku Science and Technology Foundation Research Grant

projects.name: Friction Reduction of Machine Elements Through Surface Function Design
projects.summary: This project focused on reducing friction in mechanical elements through surface function design, enhancing energy efficiency and durability.
projects.funding: Shibaura Institute of Technology Project Research Grant

projects.name: Development of Direct Fabrication Method for Glass Fiber Reinforced Shape Memory Polymer (GFR-SMP) Components with Clad-Core Structure
projects.summary: This research focuses on developing a direct fabrication method for glass fiber reinforced shape memory polymer (GFR-SMP) components with a clad-core structure, enhancing their mechanical properties and functionality.
highlights: Glass fiber reinforced shape memory polymer (GFR-SMP)

projects.name: Study on High-Efficiency Drilling Using Vibration Processing Without the Need for Rotary Motors
projects.summary: This research focuses on the development of a high-efficiency drilling technique that eliminates the need for rotary motors by using vibration processing.
projects.funding: Nitto Kohki Co., Ltd. Joint Research

projects.name: Creation of Graded Function Materials by Laser Processing
projects.summary: This research aims to create graded function materials using laser processing techniques, enabling enhanced material properties.
projects.funding: Tokyo Institute of Technology Suematsu Prize Research Grant

projects.name: Design of High-Stiffness and High-Damping Rolling Guides with Metal-Polymer Composite Complex Structures Based on Anisotropic Stiffness Design
projects.summary: This project focuses on the design of rolling guides with high stiffness and high damping, incorporating metal-polymer composite complex structures based on anisotropic stiffness principles.
projects.funding: NSK Mechatronics Technology Advancement Foundation Research Grant

projects.name: Development of Vibration Damping Machine Elements Containing Damping Materials Using Metal Additive Manufacturing (AM)
projects.summary: This research focuses on the development of vibration-damping machine elements using metal additive manufacturing (AM) to embed damping materials for enhanced performance.

projects.name: Development of Passive Damping Structures Using Metal Additive Manufacturing (AM)
projects.summary: This project explores the development of passive damping structures using metal additive manufacturing (AM) to improve performance in various applications.
projects.funding: Matsuura Machinery Co., Ltd. Joint Research

projects.name: Creation of Graded Function Materials by Laser Processing
projects.summary: This project investigates the creation of graded function materials using laser technology to improve material properties and performance.
projects.funding: Tokyo Institute of Technology 'Research Seed Discovery' Research Grant

projects.name: Clarification and Quantitative Prediction of Damping Mechanisms in Rolling Guides Considering Nonlinear Friction Characteristics in the Microscopic Displacement Range
projects.summary: This research focuses on understanding and quantitatively predicting the damping mechanisms in rolling guides, considering the nonlinear friction characteristics in the microscopic displacement range.
projects.funding: Japan Society for the Promotion of Science (JSPS) Special Research Fellowship Grant

projects.name: Research on LM Systems for Improving Surface Finish in Machining
projects.summary: This research focuses on improving surface finish quality in machining processes through the development of LM (Linear Motion) systems.
